resources.string: The University of Leicester is a public research university based in Leicester, England. The main campus is south of the city centre, adjacent to Victoria Park. The university\'s predecessor, University College, Leicester, gained university status in 1957.

Unieval (University Evaluation) is a school evaluation system whose objective and purpose is to lay out imperative insight on different schools, by giving a well constructive structure for appraisal of these universities through required user criteria. This application was developed by team 7 for CO7095 coursework-
